name: Hunger (itch) (TGN-27)
description:
The monster under the bed is hungry! Feed the creature delicious cans of soup before the time runs out, or else you will become dinner yourself. 

--- 

A game created by the Paint Jammers group, a newbie unit inside GameDev Técnico. 

Eduardo Barrancos 

Julia Pinheiro (@dyulai on Insta)

Marisa Miranda (@fidjiby on TW)

Tomás Nascimento
